android.view
接口 GestureDetector.OnDoubleTapListener

所有已知实现类：
GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener
包容类：
GestureDetector
public static interface GestureDetector.OnDoubleTapListener

The listener that is used to notify when a double-tap or a confirmed single-tap occur.

方法摘要
 boolean onDoubleTap(MotionEvent e)
          Notified when a double-tap occurs.
 boolean onDoubleTapEvent(MotionEvent e)
          Notified when an event within a double-tap gesture occurs, including the down, move, and up events.
 boolean onSingleTapConfirmed(MotionEvent e)
          Notified when a single-tap occurs.
 

方法详细信息

onSingleTapConfirmed

boolean onSingleTapConfirmed(MotionEvent e)
Notified when a single-tap occurs.

Unlike GestureDetector.OnGestureListener.onSingleTapUp(MotionEvent), this will only be called after the detector is confident that the user's first tap is not followed by a second tap leading to a double-tap gesture.

参数：
e - The down motion event of the single-tap.
返回：
true if the event is consumed, else false

onDoubleTap

boolean onDoubleTap(MotionEvent e)
Notified when a double-tap occurs.

参数：
e - The down motion event of the first tap of the double-tap.
返回：
true if the event is consumed, else false

onDoubleTapEvent

boolean onDoubleTapEvent(MotionEvent e)
Notified when an event within a double-tap gesture occurs, including the down, move, and up events.

参数：
e - The motion event that occurred during the double-tap gesture.
返回：
true if the event is consumed, else false
